title: Anyone else?
body: So as always, Windows has forced upon me the most recent update earlier today.  Ever since this update, anytime I begin to play a game my sound all across the computer stutters (on League, Discord, Skype, etc.) and after about 10-15 seconds of this, my computer freezes and I am forced to force shut down. My first game was ranked unfortunately, but since then I've been trying a bunch of different things in custom games, but to no avail. It appears my drivers are all up to date, and League worked perfectly fine last night. Therefore I am convinced it's not a problem with my computer, but not sure if it's a problem with my League or the new Windows update, since I can play any other game with no problems. Is anyone else having any of these problems? Or have any suggestions on how to fix it?

replies.body: The windows update has caused some issues for a few players, but there are a few factors in general that could be causing you this issue.  As a first step, we've seen that the update to the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) has been causing problems, so disable it and give it another go.  Try it in a custom game mode so you don't have any penalties!  Let me know how that works for you and we'll go from there.
Ah thank you! This has seemingly fixed my problem. Much appreciated Porocles.
This solved my problem as well!! thank you!
